questions.question: Where should the joke be placed in the README?
options: Add a new 'Fun Fact' or 'Easter Egg' section at the end of the file (after line 258)
Insert it inline within an existing section (e.g., in the 'Quick Start' or 'Key Features' section)
Create a comment in the TypeScript code examples that contains a joke

answers.selectedOption: Add a new 'Fun Fact' or 'Easter Egg' section at the end of the file (after line 258)
